about_the_game:
Mr. Magic is an awesome, third-person, action-adventure game where you become a superhero.
Unlock powerful skills by visiting secret places around the globe to retrieve mystical skills before they fall into the wrong hands.
Master extraordinary abilities like teleportation and psychokinesis with mystical secrets!


This game is inspired by awesome movies from Marvel and Norman to bring similar experiences from movies into this game.
All similarities are purely coincidental.


The story starts when our hero goes to a temple in the Himalayas to learn meditation techniques. Instead, he got a manuscript to unlock magical, powerful skills. Now, he needs to protect the knowledge from dark spirits. It is time to go and find all those magical secrets in different places in the world, from underwater templates and regular cities to templates in the Himalayas.


Features:
- Flexible combat system
- Insane psychokinesis abilities to move objects and even enemies
- Great paranormal skills like teleportation from one place to another
- Levitation system
- Awesome graphics of different locations by Unreal Engine
- Unreal cinematic effects

content_descriptors.notes: This game is containing violence elements such as fighting with monsters of different types without blood elements.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 550 Ti / Intel HD 620
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K / AMD FX-8320 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 / Radeon R9 290X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
